content.description: Storm The Castle climbs a left-leaning hand crack segmented by 2 horizontal cracks that finishes onto less-than-ideal rock.
content.location:
Facing away from the problem

Anyway You Slice It

, this will be out and right(north) around the near outcropping.

content.description: Start on the lowest of the amazing wave-like flakes that head left up the face. Follow the flakes, and top out on good holds on the slightly less good rock above.
content.location:
Walk past

Anyway You Slice It

on the right. Watch on your left for a face with left-facing flakes that appear to ripple up the rock. This thing looks like art.

content.description: Start on a left-facing flake, and climb up finishing with an easy mantel.
content.location:
It is on the south (left) side of the boulder standing in the open just before

Anyway You Slice It

.

content.description: Sit start with good holds on the left and a perfect small crimp on the overhanging face for your right hand. Top out over awesome exposure as the landing drops away for the final moves.
content.protection: There is a nice, flat rock that serves as a landing until the last moves. A spotter might be able to stop you from falling past this landing from the lip.
content.location: This one stands alone in the field of dead trees between Animal Kingdom and Old Trad Tower. It's easily reckonized by the slightly overhanging, triangular face that sits on top of another squatty, flat boulder. It is on the northeast side of the rock.

content.description: Jam great hands past a bush to a flared pod, and top out from there.
content.protection: This has a pretty bad landing. Use a pad, and don't fall.
content.location:
It ascends the obvious crack directly behind (east) of

Anyway You Slice It

.

content.description: Start underneath in the small cavelet. Gain the sharp, layback flake. Mantel it, and carefully top out the slab. It is pretty classic even with the fire damaged rock....
content.protection: A pad or two and maybe a spotter.
content.location: The low cave exits the right side to a vertical fingers to handcrack formed by the crazy flake feature. This is on one of the first boulders visible east from between the Stacks/Magic Kingdom.

content.description: Animal Kingdom has a nice and long wall hosting several easy lines, with the obvious line in the center being the namesake. Begin sitting at the animal burrow near the base of the problem. Climb straight up on many positive features.
content.location: It is on a long north-facing boulder on the north side of Animal Kingdom area.
